document.full_text: briton dan wheldon won the indianapolis 500 on its 100th anniversary in stunning fashion on sunday, claiming an unlikely victory after rookie j.r. hildebrand crashed into the wall within sight of the finish line.
document.title: wheldon gifted unlikely indy 500 win
lines_and_colors: briton dan wheldon won the indianapolis 500 on its 100th anniversary in stunning fashion on sunday, claiming an unlikely victory after rookie j.r. hildebrand crashed into the wall within sight of the finish line.
